text.name: sys_description
text.text: This is the sequel to Final Burn Alpha created in 2004 by TrebbleWinner, itself based on Final Burn created in 2000 by Dave and became FB-Neo in 2019. This project has become over time one of the best emulator arcade available, thanks to Lantus and IQ_132 for their various optimizations. It is updated very often and emulates various systems such as MVS, CPS1, CPS2, System 16, System 18, X Board, Y Board from Sega, and a whole list of games Cave Toaplan, Taito, Psikyo and Kaneko. just like MAME it offers the functionalities of graphic video filters, savestate, etc ...
